novalnet-subscription.label: Subscription
novalnet-subscription.title: Subscription Configuration
novalnet-subscription.subscriptionInfo: Manage product subscriptions to allow end-users to subscribe for products for certain period. Subscription products can be offered in discounted prices to end-users to encourage subscription purchases.

productSettings.productPurchaseTitle: Convert this product to a subscription based product
productSettings.productPredefinedTitle: Select the predefined option for the product detail page
productSettings.displayNameHelpText: The entered name will be displayed in the product edit options.
productSettings.multipleSelectionHelpText: Enable this option to show the multiple subscription possibility for the end customer.
productSettings.multipleIntervalPeriodHelpText: Select the interval period that will be displayed to end customer in product detail page.
productSettings.durationMultipleHelpText: Enter the numbers of recurring to be occurs and it will be automatically terminate the subscription after the subscription period. The period here includes any free trial period or time provided before synchronising first renewal date.(Note: If the field is empty endless subscription will run)
productSettings.intervalHelpText: Choose the regular interval for the subscription.
productSettings.renewalIntervalHelpText: Selected interval periods will be used for the following recurring.
productSettings.durationHelpText: Automatically terminate the subscription after the subscription period. The period here includes any free trial period or time provided before synchronising first renewal date.
productSettings.renewalDurationHelpText: Automatically expire the subscription after this length of time. This will not include any free trial and initial setup amount in renewal period.
productSettings.signUpFeeHelpText: Include an amount to be charged as a sign-up fee. The sign-up fee will be charged immediately, even if the product has a free trial.
productSettings.freeTrialPeriodHelptext: You can optionally offer the first order for free with a sign-up fee, if any. The trial period cannot exceed: 31 days, 52 weeks, 12 months.
productSettings.discountScopeHelptext: Enter the scope of the discount where it is to be applied
productSettings.discountHelptext: Enter the discount and select whether the discount should be applied as a percentage or absolute
productSettings.productPageTextDescription: Enter the text want to display in the product detail page
productSettings.inheritVarientsHelptext: Activate to offer subscription for variants products
productSettings.discountDelete: Do you want to delete the Subscription discount period?
productSettings.emptyError: Please fill out all required fields.

list.textDeleteConfirm: Are you sure you really want to delete the subscription "{subsNumber}"?

detail.actionConfirm: Are you sure you want to continue?
detail.manualRecurringConfirm: Are you sure you want to run the next recurring cycle manually?
detail.dateDescription: Allow end-users to cancel the subscription next cycle date, on the order-history page.
detail.reasonDescription: Allow end-users to cancel the subscription next cycle date, on the order-history page.
detail.pendingNotice: This subscription status is PENDING, It is not completed/Unsuccessful (initial payment). So not able to delete this subscription.
detail.retryNotice: Unable to execute this subscription due to order status `{reason}`. This subscription cannot be continued for the next billing cycle.
detail.onholdNotice: This subscription cannot be continued for the next billing cycle.

order.pendingMessage: Subscription status changed to pending successfully
order.productErrorMessage: Product quantity should be greater than zero
order.cycleDateChange: Next Remaing Cycle Date Changed Successfully
order.renewalMessage: Subscription renewed successfully, hereafter customer will receive products regularly.
